name: Andy's Adventure (goldfishdolphin)
description:
Andy was on the expedition to explore the world, due to turbulent wind and technical fault his aircraft crashed. He ejected himself from the aircraft and landed on an uninhabited, mesmerising island. There were so many element around him fresh blue water around the island, lush green grass, sandy beach, two mountains which were connected by two bridges , trees were moving because of the windy weather. There were some paths on the mountains which established that there had been someone before him. 

There were different sort and size of rocks spread all over. The sun in the blue, cloudy sky was dazzling his eyes. At top of the one mountain there were remains of a medieval fort. The fort building had 2 rooms which some doors, windows and stairs. 

 There was a hidden skull inside one of the rooms to scare the player and in other room there was an object to be collected by the player. Andy was supposed to collect some wood logs for his survival so he could burn some fire to keep himself warm, cook food and scare the wild animals away. 

Can you please help him.
